title: Competition: Win Tickets for L-Vis 1990 & Deadboy
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/L_VIS_1990.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/L_VIS_1990.jpg)

With **L-Vis 1990 & Deadboy’s** appearance at **World Headquarters** in Newcastle less than a week away, the guys from **Deviate** have kindly given us two free tickets for the night. All you have to do to win is email us at **crackintheroadtv@googlemail.com**, the winner will then be picked at random. The only condition we have is that the winner must ‘Like’ us on _Facebook_ first, because we’re picky like that. Below are all the links you need, and remember if you don’t win it’s still going to be a great night, so get down to **WHQ** on the 28th of May.

[‘Like’ us on Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/toby.nichol?v=wall&story_fbid=429414910249&rc673df5a&refid=0#!/pages/Crack-In-The-Road/114090381951328?ref=ts)

[Check out The Event on Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/toby.nichol?v=wall&story_fbid=429414910249&rc673df5a&refid=0#!/event.php?eid=115579438473718&ref=ts)
